sentences.sContent: ...I've been looking at what self-proclaimed experts were saying about unemployment during the Great Depression; it was almost identical to what Very Serious People are saying now...
...The campus and the American university have become identical in people’s minds...
...especially those in the same family and even identical twins...
...Offspring of mice fed a high-fat diet during pregnancy are much more likely to become fat than the offspring of identical mice fed a normal diet...

phrases.pCn: n. 同卵双生，全等双生

words.tran: 可辨认的；可认明的；可证明是同一的
可辨认地；可看作是相同地
身份；同一性，一致；特性；恒等式

trans.tranCn: 完全相同的， 同一的
trans.tranOther: exactly the same, or very similar
